items.name: Classic Pancakes
items.fullDescription: Our signature fluffy pancakes made from scratch with premium ingredients. Each pancake is carefully crafted to achieve the perfect texture - light, airy, and incredibly satisfying. Served with real maple syrup, fresh butter, and a side of seasonal berries. These pancakes have been our customers' favorite for over a decade.

benefits.title: High in Protein
benefits.description: Our pancake batter includes protein-rich ingredients that help keep you satisfied and energized throughout the morning.

benefits.title: Good Source of Fiber
benefits.description: Made with whole grain flour that provides essential fiber for healthy digestion and sustained energy release.

benefits.title: Rich in Vitamins & Minerals
benefits.description: Fortified with essential B vitamins and minerals that support brain function and overall health.

benefits.title: Natural Ingredients
benefits.description: Made with farm-fresh eggs, organic flour, and natural maple syrup - no artificial preservatives or flavors.

reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious! The pancakes were fluffy and the maple syrup was amazing. Will definitely come back for more.
Great taste and portion size. The berries were fresh and added a nice touch to the dish.
Perfect breakfast! The pancakes were cooked to perfection and the service was excellent.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.fullDescription: A classic Caesar salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, house-made croutons, fresh parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing. Our dressing is prepared daily using traditional methods with anchovies, garlic, lemon juice, and premium olive oil. Topped with grilled chicken breast for added protein.

benefits.title: Rich in Antioxidants
benefits.description: Romaine lettuce provides vitamins A and C, which act as powerful antioxidants protecting your cells from damage.

benefits.title: High Quality Protein
benefits.description: Grilled chicken breast provides lean protein essential for muscle maintenance and growth.

benefits.title: Heart-Healthy Fats
benefits.description: Our olive oil-based dressing contains monounsaturated fats that support cardiovascular health.

benefits.title: Bone Health Support
benefits.description: Rich in calcium from parmesan cheese and vitamin K from lettuce, supporting strong bones.

reviews.comment: Best Caesar salad I've ever had! The dressing is incredible and the chicken was perfectly grilled.
Fresh, crispy, and delicious. The homemade croutons are a nice touch!
Great salad with generous portions. The dressing has the perfect balance of flavors.

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.fullDescription: Premium USDA Choice ribeye steak, aged for 28 days for maximum tenderness and flavor. Grilled to your preference and served with our signature garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables. This 12oz cut is marbled with just the right amount of fat for incredible juiciness and taste. Finished with herb butter and served on a sizzling plate.

benefits.title: Complete Protein Source
benefits.description: Provides all essential amino acids needed for muscle building, repair, and overall body function.

benefits.title: Rich in Iron
benefits.description: Excellent source of heme iron, which is easily absorbed by the body and helps prevent anemia.

benefits.title: B-Vitamin Complex
benefits.description: High in B12, B6, and niacin, supporting nervous system health and energy metabolism.

benefits.title: Zinc & Selenium
benefits.description: Contains important minerals that support immune function and wound healing.

reviews.comment: Outstanding steak! Cooked to perfection and incredibly tender. The mashed potatoes were creamy and delicious.
Best steak in town! The quality is exceptional and the presentation was beautiful.
Great steak with excellent flavor. The vegetables were fresh and perfectly seasoned.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.fullDescription: Traditional Neapolitan-style Margherita pizza made with our house-made dough, San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella di bufala, and aromatic basil leaves. Baked in our wood-fired oven at 900Â°F for that perfect crispy crust and smoky flavor. This classic pizza represents the colors of the Italian flag and embodies the essence of authentic Italian cuisine.

benefits.title: Lycopene from Tomatoes
benefits.description: Rich in lycopene, a powerful antioxidant that may help protect against heart disease and certain cancers.

benefits.title: Calcium from Cheese
benefits.description: Fresh mozzarella provides calcium essential for strong bones and teeth.

benefits.title: Complex Carbohydrates
benefits.description: Our sourdough crust provides sustained energy and contains beneficial probiotics.

benefits.title: Fresh Herbs Benefits
benefits.description: Basil contains antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties that support overall health.

reviews.comment: Authentic Italian taste! The crust was perfectly crispy and the fresh mozzarella was amazing.
Best Margherita pizza outside of Italy! The wood-fired oven makes all the difference.
Delicious pizza with fresh ingredients. The basil was aromatic and added great flavor.
